13512.content:
It was another casual day of school for Timmy Turner. He got another F on his homework, Trixie ignored him, and he was bullied by Francis. Today though, Timmy felt like he had enough of it. After coming home from school, he stormed into his room and jumped onto his bed. Wanda and Cosmo then poofed in and Wanda asked if Timmy had a tough day. He told Wanda everything that had happened and he was sick of it.

Timmy then found out a way to make it stop. "Cosmo! Wanda! I wish every meal was just desserts!" Timmy shouted. "Didn't you already make that wish sport?" Wanda asked. "Yeah, and everyone got big and fat and the earth was heading towards the sun." Cosmo added. "Yeah, but only my meals this time." Timmy answered back. "I want to be so big and fat that people will fear and respect me. Also I liked eating nothing but desserts before. I also want to make sure I can still move easily no matter how fat I get." He added. Cosmo lifted his wand without care, and Wanda lifted hers with a little bit of regret.

Soon, after about...
13512.title: Just Desserts again?

135121.content:
It had been a week since Timmy made his dessert wish and there were already showing signs of growing. His stomach was bigger, his arms and legs were a bit plumper, he gained a second chin, and his cheeks were slightly puffed up. Timmy was enjoying his growth, and he didn't want to stop.

It was another day at school and it was lunch time. Timmy's wish only affected his own lunch and he got chocolate pie, some cookies, and a small glass of soda. While Timmy was eating, Trixie Tang came over to him surprisingly. "Um.. Hey Timmy. I noticed how... big you've been getting and... I think I like it" she said to Timmy's surprise. "You... like how fat I'm getting?" Timmy asked his crush. "Yeah and you know what would be better? If you got larger." Trixie whispered into Timmy's ear. Upon hearing that, Timmy knew this wish was a great idea. He also had another plan in his head.

Trixie then walked away waving at Timmy. Once she was gone, Timmy grabbed Cosmo and Wanda (who were disguised as pens). "Did you hear that guys? Trixie loves the fatter me!" Timmy quietly exclaimed. "Are you sure this is a good idea sport? What if Trixie wants to take this weight gain thing too far?" Wanda asked hesitantly. "Who cares how far this goes. Plus I still have you guys just in case anything goes wrong." Timmy answered. "Now I have another wish..." Timmy said making Wanda even more worried. "I wish all the food I ate was even more fattening!" Timmy nearly shouted.

Cosmo lifted his wand, confused as to why Timmy wanted to get fat instead of buff and Wanda raised hers with loads of regret. Once the wish was made, Timmy scarfed down his meal and his body immediately grew another tiny inch of fat after he swallowed his food.
135121.title: A week later

choices: No, let's stick with a month later
1351211.content: Okay, maybe a month is too long after a wish like that. How about over the weekend he goes on a binge for two straight days and when he goes back to school he's massive?
1351211.title: One month later

13512111.content:
It was Saturday and Timmy had planned to do nothing but binge on sweets the entire weekend. "Cosmo! Wanda! It's time to start!" Timmy shouted. His fairies appeared curious about what their godchild was talking about. "What do you mean Timmy?" Cosmo asked. "Time for me to get incredibly huge! I'm going to do nothing but eat until school!" Timmy answered. "Woah there sport! Are you sure you want to do that? Being big may have some perks, love related or not, but there are far more consequences to it!" Wanda nagged at Timmy. "I can just wish those away, plus there's nothing in "Da rules" against it right?" Timmy shot back.

"Now, I wish I had a mountain of food!" Timmy said and his wish was granted. A hill of delicious desserts appeared in his room. Cake, brownies, donuts, cookies, and many other things made up the mountain. Timmy licked his lips and dove right into the huge pile. He was scarfing everything down and bloating up while doing so. "Hamph, mmph, mmmm! Thish ish amazing! Timmy said with his mouthful. His stomach blew up, a third chin appeared, and the rest of him just kept growing and growing. Cosmo and Wanda looked at each other wondering how far this'll go.
13512111.title: Yes

choices: Timmy goes on another huge junk food binge
His parents want to take him to a cake factory for a tour
135121111.content:
The next day, Timmy's parents were preparing breakfast for their son. A bowl of chocolate cereal, a glass of chocolate milk, a plate of donuts, and a brownie. "Timmy! Breakfast is ready!" Timmy's Mom called out. "Coming!" Timmy replied in a slightly deeper voice. Loud footsteps could be heard from outside of the kitchen, and the closer it got the room started to shake. Timmy showed up and had to squeeze himself through the door.

He had definitely gotten huge over yesterday's binge. His arms had 4 inches of fat on them, his cheeks were puffed up and covering the bottom part of his eyes making it look like he was always smiling, he had a massive triple chin with a fourth on the way, each of his butt cheeks were almost twice the size of watermelons, his moobs were showing up through his pink shirt and they were the only things being covered, and his stomach was the biggest part of his body being bigger than a beach ball. Not only did he get fatter, but taller as well and he was almost up to his parents chest. Timmy waddled over to the table and sat down, but the chair broke immediately upon impact. His parents noticed this and just set the food down on the floor for Timmy to eat.

Timmy chowed down on everything in sight and he was done with breakfast in seconds, he let out a monstrous burp and bloated up a little. "Alright thanks for breakfast, I'm going back to my room." Timmy said in his husky voice.
135121111.title: Sunday

And we want you to come with us!” Timmy was puzzled at first and said “The Cake N’ Bacon doesn’t have a factory.” “We know, this just opened up recently for some reason!” Timmy’s Dad replied. Timmy then saw this as an opportunity to become even bigger, maybe even more so then if he just binged on sweets in his room.

So he decided to go with his parents to this new factory. The car rolled up, leaning back because of how heavy Timmy was sitting in the back. They got out and were ready for the tour. choices: Drink one, and eat loads of food from the kitchen
1533221.content: It was another boring day in the Test household. Johnny had run out of things to do and was waiting for his sisters to call him up to their lab to test some random experiment on him. A few minutes later, they did sand Johnny instantly ran up there. Johnny then asked what he had to do. Susan and Mary told him he just had to drink a formula they made. He instantly chugged the liquid from the test tube. He then asked what it was going to do. His sisters told him that it was going to add some body fat to him and temporarily make any food he eats into fat. Just then his stomach started to rumble and he instantly gained a little bit of weight, getting a little pot belly, moobs, and thicker arms and legs. His face also swelled up but not as much as the rest of him. After it was all said and done, he gained about 15 pounds. Johnny wasn't really surprised by this because he tested things that made him gain weight before. Something felt different about this experiment though, Johnny felt like he liked being fat. His sisters then gave him a small table full with food. He dug in, with each bite making him the tiniest bit fatter. The sisters said this effect would only last 30 minutes. When Johnny finished his meal , he gained another 5 pounds. Johnny then asked for some more of the formula, but his sisters denied him saying that they were going to give it to people who need to gain weight and not be super skinny. Johnny sighed walking back to his room. Then Johnny had an idea, sneak into his sisters lab (of course), but this time: during the night. Later that evening, when everyone (except Johnny) was asleep, he then walked to the lab typed in the code to the door, and found a briefcase full with small test tubes of the formula. He then decided to...
1533221.title: Sisters experiment

15332211.content:
Johnny then grabbed as many tubes as he could in both hands and he instantly chugged them all down. He continued to do this until there was no drop of formula left for him to drink. Once he was done his belly was slightly more bloated than before. He just had to wait for the real effects to kick in. Suddenly, his stomach started rumbling very loudly.

He instantly started fattening up. His stomach was filling up with fat, his thighs were coming together, his cheeks were swelling, his butt was inflating, he grew a second then a third chin, and his arms and legs were expanding. Johnny couldn't be happier to see how big he was getting. By the end of it, he weighed almost 500 pounds. (He now looked like this: https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/car... but much fatter)

It was a miracle how his clothes hadn't burst off of him. "Oh yeah, now this is what I'm talking about." Johnny said to himself in his now slightly deeper voice. He then went off to eat some food. What he didn't realize is that the effect of eating food wouldn't last 30 minutes anymore. It would last forever seeing as how much formula he drank. He went to find food in...

1533322222222222322121.content:
It was another successful hunt for Gaston he was able to hunt down a mighty bear and of course, he had to carry it back to the town in order for them to bask in his grandeur. As Gaston made his way tot he town square carrying the behemoth of a bear all by himself he threw it to the ground and stepped on it giving his signature masculine pose. The crowd went wild, and although he was loving every minute of it, he felt something still missing, but of course, his lady, Belle had brutally rejected him when he asked for her hand in marriage. It still bothered him he would win the whole crowd, except her. And now she's gone and no one knows of her whereabouts. But before Gaston could continue to complain, his stomach growled in hunger. He did work up quite an appetite hunting this bear. He picked up his newest trophy and began heading his way over to the tavern as he entered he heard the hustle and bustle it may have been the afternoon but it was busy as always. As Gaston sat down on his throne playing the dead animal as a rug he asked for his usual meal.

As he waited still feeling irritated at Belle's rejection of him yet again he was interrupted by his meal being shoved in his face. he hastily grabbed it digging in to quell his gnawing hunger. As he finished his meal he rubbed his belly, though he noticed that it seemed... softer than it used to be. As Gaston lifted up his tunic he saw his abs had morphed into a small layer of pudge. He had been eating more than usual, but he just shook it off, he was Gaston after all he wouldn't let his muscular body turn into flab

1533322222222222322222222221121.content:
It had been a few years since everything that happened...happened. Wild adventures, crazy wars, epic battles for the fate of worlds...it all seemed so distant now. Everyone had settled into a quiet life on Beach City, even if now there were a few more faces making their way about Earth.

Sure, there was the odd gem crisis or magical mcguffin that needed defeating or protecting or whatever, but for the most part, everything had evened out, and the Crystal Gems could live normal and peaceful lives.

Usually.

"Pearl? Guys?" Steven asked, shutting the traumatized screen door behind him. He was older now, finally a fully-fledged eighteen years old-not that it showed. He was a bit taller, his voice a bit deeper, and maybe on occasion a bit of facial hair sprouted. But at the moment, he was his usual baby-faced self. "Everything okay?"

Pearl looked up from the artifact she was examining-some kind of whisk-looking thing with a blue gemstone in then handle-and greeted Steven with a smile.

"Oh! Perfect timing, Steven! Garnet, Amethyst, and I are going to return this Gem Light Manipulation Apparatus to its rightful place."

"Yeah dude, wanna come?" Amethyst jumped in eagerly.

"Oh, uh, no thanks!" Steven laughed, flashing them a smile that healed as well as any Rose Quartz could. "I'd love to come, but even Steven G. Pink Diamond Universe-Quartz himself needs a break."

"Awww, lame."

"That's perfectly alright, Steven." Pearl nodded. "But are you sure you can handle yourself? What if Beach City gets attacked?" This time, Garnet stepped in.

"Steven can handle himself, Pearl. He's a big boy after all." Garnet explained, a hand on Pearl's shoulder.

"Hah! Yeah, big in more than one way!" Amethyst joked, pointing at Steven's potbelly that had been with him since the beginning. Pearl scrunched her nose up at Amethyst's crude remark.

"AMETHYST! That was very rude of you!" She started, but Steven's laugh brought her to a halt.

"No, no, she's right." Steven reached down and grabbed the ball of flab that poked its way through his iconic t-shirt. "I like my flub! That just means there's more of me to love, right?"

"Right." Garnet nodded. "Let's go, gems. And Steven-" Steven perked up, a distinct clack hitting the air as he set his ukelele on the coffee table.

"Keep your eyes on the horizon, not your waistline." Garnet joked. And in a flash, the trio was gone, leaving Steven alone to himself. He let out a content sigh, and put his hands on his hips.

"Alright! Steven Universe, you now have free reign! What to do, what to do..."
1533322222222222322222222221121.title: Alone Time

15333222222222223222222222211211.content:
Steven was far from a great liar. As he'd gotten older, he'd learned a lot of things he loved. And while he loved going on missions, he loved food even more. And after his earth-shattering experiences, food was a very, very welcome change.

In a flurry of tearing packaging, microwaving, and general sing-song movements, Steven had prepared himself quite the feast! Waffles, pancakes, popcorn, burgers, pizza-if it could be stuffed into a microwave and ready inside a minute, it was on his plate.

"Hah! It's like Together Breakfast! But today, it's just me..." He stuck a finger into his softer middle. "And you, Steven Stomach!"

He carried his plates up the stairs, humming a cheerful tune. He kicked on the TV, threw himself onto then sheets, and got ready to dig in. But before that, he took a moment.

What Amethyst said really stuck out to him. He had been eating more lately, and with no life endangered, he hadn't been working the weight off. This sort of lazy, beach boy lifestyle was something he'd fallen into. But did he like it?

He squeezed his chubby middle. He wasn't quite /fat/ per day. Steven was soft. Round. A little plump. And no one really cared enough to say anything. But...he did like it. He wondered why he was spending so much time thinking about it, and immediately pushed all those thoughts from his mind.

"Time to eat!"
15333222222222223222222222211211.title: "Make some food!"

153332222222222232222222222112112.content:
Right as the first mouthful reached his tongue, that familiar ringtone came in. He opened up Cryscord (because who uses Videophone anymore?), and was immediately met with the face of Ronaldo Fryman, an eager yet smug look on his face.

Now, unlike Steven, Ronaldo had changed a lot in the last few years. Mostly in terms of width. Ronaldo had put on a lot of weight. Like, a lot. It hardly bothered Steven, but it was beyond noticeable. His belly ballooned out before him, threatening to pop the buttons of any shirt he wore. His face had become even rounder, a chin or two making him resemble some kind of greasy marshmallow mascot. He was always soaked in sweat, and his face was constantly covered in some kind of foodstuffs, because he was always stuffing his face. But this did little to change his demeanor, even as his sentences were punctuated by belches.

But in short, he was massive.

"He-he-heeeeey, Ste-man!" URRRRLLP! "What's goin' on?" Ronaldo said cheerfully, not even trying to stifle his gas.

"Hi Ronaldo!" Steven said with a smile, going in for a second bite of his midday waffles.

"Woaaah, that's a lotta food, lil' S!" Ronaldo peered into the camera, almost drooling. "What are you? Becomin' a gainer?"

"A...gainer?" Steven asked. Ronaldo's jaw dropped.

"Oh my kawaii, you haven't heard of gaining!?" Ronaldo gasped sharply, and immediately lost all of the air in his lungs to a burp or two. "It's the latest internet subculture trend!"

"Sorry, heh. You know I don't keep up with that stuff." Steven laughed it off, but Ronaldo seemed only more concerned.

"Are you kidding me!? This is much more than 'stuff,' this is 'stuffing!'" Ronaldo started. "Gainers are guys on the internet who just eat and eat and eat and get as fat as possible! They gain tons of followers, and their followers give them lots of money!"

Huh? Okay. Now Steven was interested. Not for the money bit, but the gaining bit. "People actually gain weight, like, willingly? And they get paid!"

"Yeah! It's super big and trendy right now. It's how I've been pulling my weight-pun intended-around the house since I got too big for the Frybo costume!"

Steven thought for a moment about the mental image of Ronaldo hooked up to a grease hose while in the Frybo suit, fat belly filling up more, more, until bloated rolls oozed out of every hole they could find, until the costume was ripped to shreds in a bombastic BOOM! And standing there, still swelling, was Ronaldo, boxers hanging on for dear life, until-

Steven shook his head, shuddering. What was that all about. And why was his heart pounding?

"Hello? Earth to Steven!" Ronaldo brought him back to reality. "Well, judging by your reaction and using my incredible intellect, I am able to deduce that you are very, very interested. I'll send you some links, you can do some research, you know. Tell me when you get everything started!"

"Oh, uh..." Steven blinked, still trying to process what just happened, let alone what was happening... "Th-thanks, Ronaldo."

"No problem, my lightweight compadre! If you need someone to coach you in the bountiful world of blubber, feel free to ask yours truly." Ronaldo said smugly. But that smugness was cut short as a loud, deep voice rang through Ronaldo's mic.

"WHAT!?" Pause. "I'M TALKIN' TO STEVEN!!" Pause. "CANT YOU DO IT IN THE TEN MINUTES ITS GOING TO TAKE ME TO GET UP?" Pause, then angry yelling and footsteps. "Ah, piss. I'll talk to you later, Steve-o!"

"Uh, b-bye!" Steven said, waving as the line went dead. He began to chew on what he had just been told...and he stared at the links in his inbox. Hmmmm.
153332222222222232222222222112112.title: Ronaldo, calling!

1533322222222222322222222222111.content:
It was another day for Mac after a long boring day of school he went home.
He wanted to go to Forsters home for imaginary friends but sadly for him it was too late in the day so he had to go straight home.
Mac was a boy bursting with imagination and spirit and if their was one thing he hated it was being bored.

He sat in his room watching TV bored out of his skull flipping trough tv shows when something caught his attention.
It was a sumo show broadcasting big fat round men wrestling with each other slamming their big fat bellies into one another and squishing them with their fat butts.
The Sumo show captivated young Mac something about the Sumo wrestlers massive round bellies and huge jiggly butts made him feel all tingly inside.

Mac said "This is so cool I wish I was like that..."
It was then Mac had a brilliant thought that made him very excited.
He got up and stood in his room and began to think up the perfect image of a sumo wrestler with a massive fat jiggly round belly a large wobbly ass, huge fat arms and legs and big chubby cheeks and maybe two or three chins.
But then he imagined his own head ontop of that massive fat sumo wrestler body.

Suddenly in a flash of light his imagination came to live as.....

info.brief_description: Male characters from your favorite cartoons start packing on the pounds!
info.description:
This is a male only cartoon weight gain story. Ground rules:

1. Sex (gay or straight) is allowed, but try to keep it limited.
2. I will allow vore, but try to keep scat/intense slob stuff to a minimum.
3. HAVE FUN!

*Feel free to add chapters!*
